Package me.damoebe.network

Klasse Network

java.lang.Object
me.damoebe.network.Network
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
DeepNetwork, EvolutionNetwork
public abstract class Network extends Object
The abstract class for FFNeuralNetworks

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Network

      protected Network(int inputSize, int outputSize, int hiddenLayerSize, int hiddenLayerAmount, double learningRate)
      The main constructor of a Network
      Parameter:
      inputSize - The size of the first layer
      outputSize - The size of the last layer
      hiddenLayerSize - The size of the hiddenlayers
      hiddenLayerAmount - The amount of hiddenlayers that should be generated

    • Network

      public Network(int inputSize, int outputSize, int hiddenLayerSize, int hiddenLayerAmount)
      Network constructor for networks without a learning rate - 0.0 (for example evolution learning)
      Parameter:
      inputSize - The size of the first layer
      outputSize - The size of the last layer
      hiddenLayerSize - The size of the hiddenlayers
      hiddenLayerAmount - The amount of hiddenlayers that should be generated

  • Methodendetails

      public void updateAllActivations()

      Inserts input activations into the network
      Parameter:
      input - A Double ArrayList containing the neuron activations.

    • getOutput

      public List<Double> getOutput()
      Gets all output activations
      Gibt zurück:
      A Double List containing all output layer activations.

      public void setNoise(double noise)
      Sets the network noise.
      Parameter:
      noise - The new noise of the network.

      The abstract train function
      Parameter:
      input - The inputs for this repetition
      optimalOutput - The optimalOutputs for this repetition
